project.name: The Brain
project.purpose: Flask-based control center for Build, Fix, and Know flows with an office manager demo dataset.
primary_user_flows: Build: plan and generate implementation tasks via the Build orchestrator
Fix: review and apply automated fixes with the Fix service
Know: answer operational questions through the Knowledge service
Office manager dashboards: roster, schedule, and maintenance views
Machine Room: supervisor overview of database metrics and audit history

backend.database: SQLAlchemy with SQLite or PostgreSQL via DATABASE_URL
services: ImportService for CSV and JSON uploads

completed_or_legacy.title: Wire Build/Fix/Know flows to orchestrator, fixer, and knowledge services
Machine Room reporting for employees, flights, maintenance, and audit logs
CSV/JSON import pipeline for roster and flight data
